meanings.definition: A lace or cord used to fasten a shoe.
meanings.sent1: I tied my sneakers with colorful shoestrings.
meanings.sent2: Her shoestrings kept coming untied during the race.
meanings.sent3: He thought his shoestrings were snakes trying to escape!
meanings.sent4: The bond between us is like the intertwining of shoestrings.
meanings.sent5: The old man's shoestrings told stories of many walks taken.

meanings.sent1: She saved every penny, even the smallest shoestrings.
meanings.sent2: I can't go; I'm short on shoestrings for this trip.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his wallet was full of invisible shoestrings.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity knew no bounds; she gave away her last shoestring.
meanings.sent5: In his hands, those shoestrings turned into treasures beyond measure.
